item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: kelseygrauke@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Landing Page
item.dc:creator: kelseygrauke@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
Do you want a different page than your blog, to be the first page your readers see when they come to your WordPress site? Or maybe you are looking for a creative way to market a product or service… either way, try using a Landing Page! Landing pages can mean more than one thing. The traditional definition of a landing page would reference the page the visitor originally landed when clicking the inbound link to get to your website.
 

Reason #1: To Buy This Theme

With Affiliate Pro, you can showcase your impressive content while tastefully displaying your niche images and encouraging your readers to click through and shop your post. Because time = money. Plus, it's down-right sexy.

Reason #2: To Buy This Theme

User experience is important to you. So, we’ve used the latest techniques to give you and your readers a delightful and life-giving experience. We develop with the highest degree of integrity and are continuously refining our code to be even better.

Reason #3: To Buy This Theme

Affiliate Pro is built on the Genesis framework and comes WooCommerce ready. Plus, we’re here for you every step of the way to ensure your installation and setup are painless.

Back to the Demo Buy Affiliate Pro

item.title: FAQ
item.dc:creator: kelseygrauke@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
Chic and functional, Affiliate Pro is an niche's dream come true. It's full of style, yet built to convert clicks and increase your niche income.

Features of  Affiliate Pro:

  • Easy to customize
  • Widgetized homepage for a flexible, engaging layout
  • Choose colors to match your branding
  • Upload your own logo or simply type in your website name to match the default branding
  • WooCommerce ready
  • Responsive, mobile-friendly design
  • Integrate with email subscriptions
  • Optional floating Instagram feed to increase subscribers
  • Crafted buttons and forms
  • HTML5 Markup
  • Built-in Read more button
  • Styled share buttons, recent posts widget, subscribe widget, contact form, and Instagram
  • Landing page, full-width template
  • Designed to grow your business
  • Built-in Instagram Landing page
What can I customize? Affiliate Pro is designed to be easy to customize! Because it should feel like you. You can choose any logo, menu, sub menu, link, button, background images, etc. You can utilize any and all 7 homepage widget areas for your business needs.
What is the sidebar and image post size? The sidebar width is 340 px. And the post area is 675px.
What size is the logo area? The logo size is 400 x 150px. However, your logo will display at 200 x 72px due to retina screens need a double resolution to appear clear on all device sizes.
How does the homepage work? The homepage has 5 widget areas for you to use. You can set up as many or as few widget areas as you'd like. You can use any plugins of your choice. We walk you through step-by-step how to set up the homepage just like the demo in the theme documentation.
Can you install it for me? We would love to! See our installation and custom design services here.

item.title: About
item.dc:creator: kelseygrauke@gmail.com
item.content:encoded:
let's meet

Chic and functional, this theme is an niche's dream come true. It's full of style, yet built to convert clicks and increase your niche income. You're a visionary and a go-getter with a love for sophistication and class, and you also have your geek glasses ready at a moment's notice because we both know all the style in the world don't mean anything unless the numbers work. With Lifestyle, you can showcase your impressive content while tastefully displaying your niche images and encouraging your readers to click through and shop your post. Because time = money. And, here's a few tech-y details of Lifestyle:
  • Genesis Child Theme
  • Styled Affiliate Previews
  • Customize theme with any color & your own logo
  • Instagram in Header
  • Styled Featured Posts/Pages
  • 4 Homepage Widget Areas
  • Sticky Navigation Bar
  • Styled Share Buttons
  • Styled Affiliate Featured Link
  • Mobile Friendly
  • Built-in featured post and two featured niche links widgets
PSST... This is an example of a WordPress page, you could edit this to put information about yourself or your site so readers know where you are coming from.

item.title: Travel Diary: Paris, France
item.dc:creator: kelseygrauke@gmail.com
item.content:encoded: Liquorice tootsie roll sweet roll pastry carrot cake gummi bears. Fruitcake cupcake pie chocolate pastry gummi bears jujubes. Muffin soufflé cookie toffee croissant. Cotton candy cookie tootsie roll candy jelly beans bear claw brownie dragée. Dragée ice cream croissant tootsie roll cheesecake donut danish cheesecake. Topping icing chupa chups gingerbread. Chupa chups pie candy canes jelly tiramisu bear claw topping. Danish cotton candy tiramisu oat cake liquorice lollipop. Chocolate cake toffee candy canes. Marshmallow icing toffee croissant. Ice cream gingerbread ice cream. Sweet roll powder topping topping candy canes powder. Sweet jelly-o halvah. Macaroon tiramisu cake sugar plum. Apple pie carrot cake brownie biscuit macaroon candy cake jelly-o chocolate cake. Carrot cake gummies ice cream donut dragée donut gummies danish. Halvah halvah pudding danish oat cake carrot cake.
